description:
Statistics is about extracting meaning from data. In this class, we will introduce techniques for visualizing relationships in data and systematic techniques for understanding the relationships using mathematics.Why Take This Course?This course will cover visualization, probability, regression and other topics that will help you learn the basic methods of understanding data with statistics. 

                                            Syllabus
                        ### Lesson 1: Visualizing relationships in data

Seeing relationships in data and predicting based on them; Simpson's paradox

### Lesson 2: Probability 

Probability; Bayes Rule; Correlation vs. Causation

### Lesson 3: Estimation 

Maximum Likelihood Estimation; Mean, Median, Mode; Standard Deviation, Variance

### Lesson 4: Outliers and Normal Distribution 

Outliers, Quartiles; Binomial Distribution; Central Limit Theorem; Manipulating Normal Distribution

### Lesson 5: Inference

Confidence intervals; Hypothesis Testing

### Lesson 6: Regression

Linear regression; correlation

### Lesson 7: Final Exam
title: Intro to Statistics
